description: Managing Director of Iran's Mehr Media Group, Mohammad Mahdi Rahmati, and TASS Director General Andrey Kondrashov signed a memorandum of understanding on the sidelines of the BRICS Media Summit, as reported by a TASS correspondent at the event.
title: Iran’s Mehr Media Group and Russia’s TASS  sign MoU

description: TEHRAN – Iran has successfully launched the domestically-developed Chamran-1 research satellite into orbit, achieving another milestone in the country’s growing space program.
title: Iran successfully launches domestically-developed Chamran-1 research satellite

description: TEHRAN-  Israel is attempting to project an image of success in the wake of its genocidal war against Gaza despite suffering setbacks on the battlefield.
title: Israel using PR to cover up battlefield setbacks

description: TEHRAN – The 7th BRICS media summit, currently underway in Moscow, marks a significant moment in the evolving media landscape within the BRICS alliance.
title: The 7th BRICS media summit: a crucial step in strengthening global media collaboration

description: MOSCOW - Today, I had the honor of attending the opening session of the BRICS Media Forum, which also marks the 120th anniversary of the TASS news agency.
title: The role of media and BRICS in reshaping power structures

description: TEHRAN – Addressing the West, Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi suggested on Saturday that “dialogue must be based on mutual respect and not threat or pressure.”
title: Dialogue must be based on respect and not pressure, Iran tells the West

description: TEHRAN – On Thursday, Ali Akbar Ahmadian, Secretary of Iran’s Supreme National Security Council, met with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Saint Petersburg.
title: A Focus on Truth and Diplomacy

description: The American-Turkish activist  Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, who was killed by Israeli gunfire in the West Bank a week ago, was buried in her family’s hometown in southwestern Turkey on Saturday.
title: Turkey buries activist killed by Israel in West Bank

description: The US Permanent Representative to the United Nations accused the UN of “inordinately over-focus” on Israel, which has killed more than 41,100 Palestinians in the Gaza Strip since October, saying that “there is an unfair amount of focus on Israel”.
title: US envoy appeasing apartheid

description:
The Israeli army’s former head of operations has criticized the continuing war in Gaza saying the regime is “stuck in Gaza and bleeding”.
Major General Israel Ziv described the war as a “dire quagmire”.
title: Former army official: Israel ‘stuck in Gaza and bleeding’

description: TEHRAN- Lebanon’s Hezbollah has announced that it has, for the first time, bombarded the base and headquarters of the Israeli military’s 282nd Artillery and Precision Missile Brigade with dozens of Katyusha rockets.
title: Hezbollah hits strategic Israeli army base

description: The Palestinian Foreign Ministry has warned of “the dangers posed by Israel’s actions to evacuate Palestinians from northern Gaza, viewing it as a prelude to the annexation of Gaza and significant parts of the territory for settlement purposes”.
title: Evacuation of northern Gaza ‘prelude’ to annexation

description: The Iraqi prime minister said Israeli forces have committed “the most heinous of killings, destruction and violation against civilians in full view of the world” in the Gaza Strip.
title: Iraqi PM condemns Israel for ‘heinous’ acts against civilians

description: The new US sanctions against RT and other Russian media outlets are a brazen act of aggression that should concern the rest of the world, as Washington could apply the same measures to others, Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said.
title: Zakharova: US sanctions against RT are ‘aggression’

description: TEHRAN- The spokesperson for the Iranian Foreign Ministry has vehemently denounced a terrorist attack that targeted Shia civilians in Sangi Takht, located in central Afghanistan.
title: Iran condemns deadly terrorist attack in Afghanistan

description: TEHRAN- Belarusian president Aleksandr Lukashenko has emphasized the importance of Iran as a vital ally for Belarus.
title: Belarusian president highlights Iran as key ally

description: TEHRAN- The political deputy of the Iranian Foreign Ministry, highlighted Iran's commitment to enhancing relations with its neighbors during a recent phone conversation with his Armenian counterpart.
title: Enhancing relations with neighboring countries top priority: Iranian diplomat

description: TEHRAN- Iranian Ambassador and Permanent Representative to the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) in Vienna, emphasized the importance of addressing technical matters without a political lens.
title: Tehran urged IAEA to maintain neutrality in technical matters

description: TEHRAN- Iranian Ambassador and Permanent Representative to the United Nations, Amir Saeed Iravani, has addressed the Security Council in a letter concerning a recent terrorist attack in Mirjaveh.
title: Tehran demands UNSC condemnation of terrorist attack in Iran

description: TEHRAN- The deputy chief of the Iranian Army for Coordination declared that Iran's armed forces are recognized as the foremost anti-terrorism entity globally.
title: Iran's military recognized as world's most powerful anti-terror force: commander

description: TEHRAN - In a commentary, Javan pointed to the visit of President Msoud Pezeshkian to neighboring Iraq.
title: Agreement and consensus with neighbors against the Zionists

description: TEHRAN-The second Iran-China Watercolor Exchange Exhibition was held at the Art Garden Pavilion (Kushk Art Garden) in Tehran from September 7 to 13 and its closing ceremony was held at the Tabi'at Bridge (the bridge of nature).
title: 2nd Iran-China Watercolor Exchange Exhibition held in Tehran

description: TEHRAN- The Film Museum of Iran will review two documentaries by the world-renowned Iranian filmmaker Abbas Kiarostami on Monday.
title: Film Museum of Iran to review Kiarostami’s docs

description: TEHRAN-Iran has participated in the 25th Baghdad International Book Fair in Iraq, which was inaugurated on Thursday.
title: Iran presenting 1,500 titles at 25th Baghdad International Book Fair

description: TEHRAN-In addition to reinforcing stereotypes of Arab and Muslim villains, comic books and movies based on them address the 9/11 attacks in another way. These attacks are metaphorical as part of a larger plot that places comic book elements and characters within mythological narratives of good versus evil.
title: Heroes of the age of terror: what happened to American superheroes on 9/11?  Part 2

description: TEHRAN - The fifth Hand-Carved Furniture Festival in Malayer has brought at least a tenfold increase in tourist numbers compared to last year, filling the city with celebrations, according to a local official.
title: Malayer tourism soars tenfold for furniture festival

description: TEHRAN - Yazd’s sports tourism sector is experiencing a significant boost as the city hosts the 2024 Asian Men’s Club Volleyball Championship, according to a local tourism official.
title: Sports tourism blossoms in World Heritage city of Yazd

description: TEHRAN – On Friday evening, the Bam-e Behesht Observatory, recognized as the third-largest in Iran and the highest of its kind, was officially inaugurated in Sarduiyeh district of Jiroft, southern Kerman province.
title: Iran’s highest observatory launched in Kerman province

description: TEHRAN – Kermanshah, the Iranian western province which shares a 371-kilometer border with both the Kurdish and Arab regions of Iraq, has set sights on Iraqi tourism market, said a local tourism official.
title: Bordering province targets Iraqi tourist market

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s ambassador to India has emphasized the importance of tourism as a bridge for deepening the longstanding cultural and people-to-people ties between the two nations.
title: Ambassador urges stronger Iran-India tourism exchange

description: Some 330,000 tons of dates of various types are forecast to be harvested this year in the southwestern Khuzestan province.
title: Date harvest in Khuzestan province

description: TEHRAN - The 2024 Asian Men’s Club Volleyball Championship is culminating in an all-Iranian showdown as Shahdab Yazd and Foolad Sirjan prepare to battle for the continental title on Sunday. This highly anticipated final promises an intense match between two of Iran’s most formidable volleyball clubs.
title: Shahdab, Foolad in highly anticipated Asian Club Volleyball Championship final

description: TEHRAN- Hamid Pour-Mohammadi, the head of Iran’s Planning and Budget Organization (PBO), said that the National Housing Movement is the major development plan of the government.
title: National Housing Movement, government’s major development plan

description: TEHRAN –The anti-narcotics police have reported the seizure of three tons and 472 kilograms of different types of narcotics in Zabol and Saravan counties, southeastern Sistan-Baluchestan province.
title: Police seize over 3 tons of drugs in southeast

description: TEHRAN – The value of non-oil export from Chaharmahal-Bakhtiari province increased by 94 percent in the past Iranian calendar year 1402 (ended on March 19), as compared to its previous year, according to a provincial official.
title: Annual export from Chaharmahal-Bakhtiari province rises 94%

description: TEHRAN – The International Exhibition of Pharmaceuticals and Related Industries (IRAN PHARMA 2024) will be held from October 2 to 4 in Tehran.
title: Tehran to host Iran Pharma Exhibition 2024

description: TEHRAN –Isfahan Artificial Intelligence (IAI) Event is scheduled to be held from October 23 to 25, bringing together faculty members, academicians, experts, and students to discuss the latest developments in the field of AI, ISNA reported.
title: Isfahan AI Event 2024 slated for October

description: TEHRAN - The Islamic Republic has outpaced Qatar in gas extraction from South Pars field which is shared between the two countries in the Persian Gulf, an official with the Pars Oil and Gas Company (POGC) said.
title: Iran outperforms Qatar in extracting gas from SP joint field: official

description: TEHRAN – In a meeting between the heads of Iran and Iraq customs administrations, the two sides stressed the need for the expansion of mutual ties, IRNA reported.
title: Iran, Iraq customs stress expansion of ties

description: TEHRAN – A business delegation from Oman has visited Iran’s Imam Khomeini Port in southwestern Khuzestan province during which they expressed interest in using the commercial capacities of the port for expanding economic ties with Iran.
title: Oman interested in using Iran’s Imam Khomeini Port trade capacities

description: TEHRAN – Gholamhossein Ramezanpour has been appointed as the new head of the Persian Gulf Star Oil Company with the approval of the company’s Board of Directors.
title: New head of Persian Gulf Star Oil Company appointed

description: TEHRAN- As announced by the head of Iran’s Thermal Power Plant Holding (TPPH), the overhaul operation of the country’s thermal power plants has been started.
title: Thermal power plants’ overhaul operation begins

description: TEHRAN-The 7th BRICS Media Summit is underway in Moscow, Russia, with representatives from Iranian media including the Tehran Times, Mehr, and IRNA in attendance. The summit was inaugurated on September 13 and will run until September 17.
title: 7th BRICS Media Summit underway in Moscow

description:
The BRICS Media Summit, hosted by Russia’s TASS news agency, officially begins in Moscow with the participation of senior media executives from BRICS member nations on September 14, 2024. 

The summit opened with a video message from Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov and a speech by his deputy, Sergey Ryabkov.
 
Among the attendees are Mohammad Mehdi Rahmati, the managing director of Mehr Media Group, and Mohammad Sarfi, the editor-in-chief of the Tehran Times.
title: BRICS Media Summit kicks off in Moscow, hosted by Tass

description: TEHRAN - Kazem Jalali, the Iranian ambassador to the Russian Federation, criticized the United States for its media strategy targeting its critics during a press conference held at the BRICS media summit on Saturday.
title: Iran’s envoy to Russia slams US media for antagonistic strategies aimed at critics

description: MOSCOW- The BRICS media summit opened in Moscow on Saturday morning. The media summit is hosted by Russia’s TASS news agency.
title: BRICS media summit opens in Moscow
Massive Quranic gathering in Imam Reza (AS) shrine
